text: te loko tauba karanara, bandagi karanara, prasansa karanara, rojho rakhanara (athava satyamargamam saphara karanara'o) ruku'a ane sijado karanara, sadacarani vato sikhavadanara ane kharaba vatothi dura rakhanara che, ane allahani hadoni raksa karanara che ane ava imanavala'one tame khusakhabara api do
